final_answer.explanation: The 1985-86 UAE Pro League winners were identified as Al Nasr. Their home stadium is Al Maktoum Stadium, which is located in Dubai. The capacity of Al Maktoum Stadium is confirmed to be 15,000 spectators. This information directly addresses the question regarding the capacity of the home stadium of the 1985-86 league winners.

graph.title: Find 1985-86 Winners
graph.content: <1176>[Find 1985-86 Winners] Identify the 1985-86 league winners from the UAE Pro League data.</1176>
graph.answer: To determine the capacity of the home stadium of the 1985-86 UAE Pro League winners, we first identify the winning club for that season. The club that won the league in 1985-86 was Al Nasr. Next, we find the stadium information for Al Nasr, which is Al Maktoum Stadium located in Dubai. Finally, we check the capacity of Al Maktoum Stadium, which is known to hold 15,000 spectators. Therefore, the capacity of the home stadium of the 1985-86 league winners is 15,000.
